name: Skill Swap
description:
Skill Swap is a text-based roguelike/RPG where players have to constantly change out their skills.

You start out with three skills, and every time you defeat an enemy, you get their skill, but, you have to replace it with one of your skills. If you fight an enemy that does nothing, it will be an easy fight, but you might have to replace a good skill afterwards.

Because this is more of a passion project than something I intend to sell, I consider the game basically finished in its current state but may update it some in the future.
